text: Instead focusing -degree -degree, can follow Fowler Jeon (2008) calculating sophisticated measures centrality. key insight can transform original (unweighted) citation matrix two different ways: co-citation matrix two rulings connected total number rulings cite . cocitation() function igraph makes following calculation: \[ \mathbf C = \mathbf{M}^\top \mathbf{M} \] bibliographic coupling, two rulings connected number common references. bibcoupling() function igraph makes following calculation: \[ \mathbf{B} = \mathbf{MM}^\top \] , diagonal elements \(\mathbf{C}\) correspond -degree ruling (row sums \(\mathbf{M}\)); whereas diagonal elements \(\mathbf{B}\) correspond -degree ruling (column sums \(\mathbf{M}\)). Following Kleinberg (1999), Fowler Jeon (2008) calculate authority score hubs ruling. first eigenvectors \(\mathbf{C}\) \(\mathbf{B}\) respectively. Breiger (2000) notes: “several stories might , , told eigenvectors. low-dimensional scaffolds support higher-dimensional structures.” case, story supposed something like : authority score case depends number times cited quality cases cite . Symmetrically, hub score case depends number cases cites quality cases cited. Thus, authority scores indicate degree case thought important resolving important issues come Court, hub scores indicate degree case well-grounded previous important rulings. Fowler Jeon (2008, 17) Calculating scores pretty straightforward using data. Using igraph package: Measurements authority correlated -degree measurements, ’re thing.  goes “hub” “-degree” measurements.  Note. makes sense SU rulings heavily represented “hubs.” Finally, note authority hub scores somewhat related ; however, definition, first rulings can never hubs last rulings can never authorities. Hence see three clusters.
code: net <- igraph::graph_from_data_frame(   ## we will use the unweighted edge list   d = citations |> select(!weight),    directed = TRUE,    vertices = metadata |> select(id, type, date, year, indegree, outdegree) )  V(net)$authority <- igraph::authority_score(net, scale = FALSE)$vector V(net)$hub <- igraph::hub_score(net, scale = FALSE)$vector igraph::as_data_frame(net, what = "vertices") |>    mutate(top = if_else(rank(-authority) %in% 1:3, name, "")) |>    ggplot(aes(indegree, authority, color = type)) +    geom_point(alpha = 1/5) +    geom_text(aes(label = top), size = 3, family = "Avenir") igraph::as_data_frame(net, what = "vertices") |>    mutate(top = if_else(rank(-hub) %in% 1:4, name, "")) |>    ggplot(aes(outdegree, hub, color = type)) +    geom_point(alpha = 1/5) +    geom_text(aes(label = top), size = 3, family = "Avenir") igraph::as_data_frame(net, what = "vertices") |>    ggplot(aes(authority, hub, color = date)) +    geom_point(alpha = 1/5) +   scale_x_log10() + scale_y_log10() + scale_color_viridis_c(trans = "date") #> Warning in scale_x_log10(): log-10 transformation introduced #> infinite values. #> Warning in scale_y_log10(): log-10 transformation introduced #> infinite values.

Por tanto, el alcance de la protección y de los servicios cargo de tales entes va mucho más allá del puro trámite de citas y consultas médicas, pues comprende el diagnóstico, la prevención, los tratamientos, los cuidados clínicos, los medicamentos, las cirugías, las terapias y todos aquellos elementos de atención que aseguren la eficiente cobertura de la seguridad social favor de las personas de la tercera edad. La conducta negligente de la demandada y la negativa brindar la atención requerida, es muy factible que haya incidido y de manera definitiva, en su pronto deceso.   DERECHO LA SALUD-Práctica inmediata e íntegra de exámenes ordenados   SENTENCIA INHIBITORIA EN TUTELA-Improcedencia   pudiendo ser inhibitoria la decisión por mandato del artículo 29, parágrafo, del Decreto 2591 de 1991, habrá de ser negativa, por haberse encontrado indemnes los derechos invocados, ni por entenderse exonerada la persona o entidad demandada, sino justamente por ser inútil e irrealizable -dadas las circunstancias- el proveído judicial, aun comprobada la conducta inconstitucional del sujeto pasivo de la demanda, como en el presente caso ocurre.   Referencia: Expediente T-245392   Acción de tutela instaurada por María Arledia García García contra el Seguro Social, Seccional Antioquia   Magistrado Ponente: Dr. JOSÉ GREGORIO HERNÁNDEZ GALINDO   …
